price: O sì máa rí àwọn ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ ní ọjọ́ yẹn, tí wọn yóò so wọ́n papọ̀ mọ́ra wọn sínú sẹ́kẹ́sẹkẹ̀.
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّقَرَّنِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَصۡفَادِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
